backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister with an empty actor.
feature_evidence.json: Report mapping implemented game features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the game project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup with extensive OKLCH theme variables for light/dark modes and global border/background styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing the root div and script tag loading the Vite React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering a full‑screen container with GameScreen.
frontend/src/game/effects/Explosion.tsx: Explosion visual component supporting hit, player, and bomb variants with deterministic ember placement.
frontend/src/game/entities/Bullet.tsx: Bullet renderer showing a glowing projectile oriented using a rotation prop.
frontend/src/game/entities/Obstacle.tsx: Hexagonal obstacle renderer with scalable sizes, hazard styling, and glowing/pulsing visual elements.
frontend/src/game/entities/PlayerJet.tsx: Renders the player jet with rotation, position, and optional thruster effects.
frontend/src/game/GameScreen.tsx: Main game logic handling player movement, bullets, obstacles, collisions, level progression, scoring, and timers.
frontend/src/game/physics/bounds.ts: Provides functions to clamp positions, detect out‑of‑bounds, and reflect velocity at playfield edges.
frontend/src/game/physics/obstacleCollis: Implements elastic collision detection and resolution between circular obstacles with position separation.
frontend/src/game/physics/vectors.ts: Defines helpers for angle-based direction vectors, converting pixel velocity to percent, and offsetting positions.
frontend/src/game/Playfield.tsx: Renders the bordered playfield with corner accents and a faint grid overlay.
frontend/src/game/ui/GameOverlay.tsx: Displays HUD, joystick, firing controls, and manages input handling based on game state.
frontend/src/game/ui/VirtualJoystick.tsx: Implements an on-screen joystick with pointer tracking and normalized movement output.
frontend/src/game/utils/levelTimer.ts: Provides level duration calculation and simple time formatting utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity with automatic query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Handles Internet Identity login state, auth client creation, and exposing identity via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file indicating no backend queries are needed for the game.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme color variables for light/dark modes, game-specific color vars, global styles, and custom utility shadows and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loading global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended theme colors mapped to CSS variables, and additional utilities, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, and pending requests related to bullet spawning, obstacle scaling, and jet-player visual updates.
